question: My daughter is 7 and for some time, she's had a spot of skin on her neck that looks dirty.  She bathes every single day, so it seems unlikely to be dirt, and scrubbing doesn't remove it.  She is a very healthy, active kid and I see no signs of diabetes or any other weird symptoms.What is this?  Moreover, when I take her to a doctor, are they going to do a bunch of expensive tests just to pay for their machines when all we need is some prescription cream?
title: Dirty looking ptch of skin on front of neck
